name: Last Another Day
description:
Welcome to our survival game.
Years after a plague has eradicated humanity and transformed many into monsters, the survivors struggle valiantly to stay alive during the zombie apocalypse that is now their reality. Build shelters to protect yourself from the shambling dead and hostile survivors. Only the most powerful players can make it to tomorrow.

FEATURES

A War for Survival
War! Everywhere. Both the shambling dead and other survivors are watching you.
Build up your shelters and bolster your armies to survive.

Smash the Zombies
Shoot zombies to collect anti-virus serum and clear zombie-infested camps to collect resources.

Develop Your Armies
Unite zombie fighters and develop your armies with unique survival skills and abilities.

Ally for Survival
Play and chat with millions of Online Players from around the world. Make an alliance and work together to survive and triumph.
